item.title: Gaiaonline fisher revamped!
item.dc:creator: @Tantrum Tantrum
item.description:
@Tantrum wrote:

This is still a work in progress but so far it does an okay job getting rid of the Logan prompt. I am currently working on making all the actions a little more random/life-like.

[scar]////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// -GaiaOnline- //
// -Auto Fisher- //
// -Revamped- //
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
// -Script By JingleBits- //
// -revamped by newguy45- //
// ##### Tweaked by Tantrum ##### //
// … //
// -Credit to Immafatmess for dealing with my ranting thanks man- //
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
// -whats new- //
// … //
// -Newly added SelectRod procedure- //
// -Minor color adjustments- //
// ##### Added Logan detection -Tantrum ##### //
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
// -instructions- //
// … //
// Drag the crosshair onto the fishing screen //
// Set the bait type to either A,D, or F. //
// Set the rod choice to either: //
// p for performance //
// p+ for performance plus //
// b for basic //
// b+ for basic plus //
// d for distance //
// d+ for distance plus //
// s for strength //
// s+ for strength plus //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program GaiaFish;
var Hours,Minutes,RealMins,Seconds,RealSecs,
x,y,c,d,z,z2,x2,x3,xmin,xmax,Fish,Bait,
L,R,P,Q:integer;
StartTime:LongInt;
TotalTime,TotalTime2:string;
const
Click=0;// dont fuck with this
BaitType=‘F’;//A for Grade A. D for Grade D. F for Grade F
RodChoice=‘s+’;//p,b,d,s,p+,b+,d+,s+,b+

var Loganbitmap,Lx,Ly,Lcx:integer;
procedure findLogan;
begin
Loganbitmap := BitmapFromString(5, 40, ‘BA9B65B2915BB89761B6’ +
‘965DAE8D57CCB081C4A576C1A273D0B182E6C798D8BFA1C5AC8EA’ +
‘38A6C866D4F7A60456D5B4F2C1A0E1E0E0129180E2C1B112C2326’ +
‘342E322520241A181D221F260D1218080F1710182316202C141E2’ +
‘A3648481B303332494F324B5200070E193334C4E1E54B6C715374’ +
‘7D23444D27444A43646D4C707C183C4C254655223A462B4755234’ +
‘2542444591E3D512D3A4A2A3C50182E45203852000F276F737E2B’ +
‘3443222F403F4E63535E709F9C979FA0A2A8ADB1A4ABB19CA0A35’ +
‘E4B3A5242335A4C415A4E42504235A17457A27659A77B5EA67A5D’ +
‘A97E5ED5A081D8A384D6A483D29D7DD49F7DC39A88CEA593D0AA9’ +
‘5CAA18DC79E88FFE9DEE0CABDC2AC9FAA9487A48E80ADAEA8BEBF’ +
‘B9D8DBD2F0F3EAFEFFF88F9490B4B9B5DEE4E0F9FFF9F8FFFA5E5’ +
‘04D574946574C48645957786E6CFFF9EFFFFAEFFFF9F1FFF6EDFF’ +
‘FAF3FFFAE3FFFBE3FFF8E2FFF6DFF8E3CE6D49297350328664487’ +
‘C5D4076573BCE9577D59E80D9A485CE9B80CB987DD19A7CD09B7C’ +
‘BB886BCD9981D4A28BB8997C9C7D61795B41634731735742A1917’ +
‘A887964A99A879B8E7EB3A799C1BBAD7975697F7B70A7A49DCBC8’ +
‘C3F9F9F1EBECE6A7A8A3C3C5C4AEB2B3FFFEFBBBBAB8ADAFAED7D’ +
‘BDE99A1A4D1C9C69894918F8F8DB0B4B5A2A7AA9689807B72698D’ +
‘89808B8A8582847F745D4F6E584B8E7C707D706771685FC196869’ +
‘A70628963567B5B507E62578C4A3C8A4C3F91574B98625889594F’ +
‘620A00600C025D0F055C110B4B040083221B8F322B8128227B262’ +
‘36E1F1B80231C8126217F2723772420691B175E0E055E0F085B10’ +
‘0A560F094F0C06’);
if(findbitmap(Loganbitmap,Lx,Ly))then
begin
Status(‘Found Logan’)
Lcx:=50;
repeat
ClickMouse(Lcx,Ly+166,true);
Wait(500);
Lcx:=Lcx+50;
until(not(findbitmap(Loganbitmap,Lx,Ly)))or(Lcx=650);
end else
Status(‘Could not find Logan’)
end;

procedure SelectRod;
Begin
If(RodChoice=‘b’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(541, 386)=5731482);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘b+’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(541, 386)=5731482);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘d’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(551, 397)=9402461);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘d+’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(551, 397)=9402461);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘s’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(526, 369)=4997255);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘s+’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(526, 369)=4997255);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘p’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(533, 362)=7445074);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘p+’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(533, 362)=7445074);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
wait(2000);
end;

procedure Cast;
begin
if(Not(GetColor(485, 371)=13033719))Then
begin
c:=0;
If(Getcolor(254,450)=12370107)Then
begin
repeat
Clickmouse(270,315,true);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click-1);
end;
c:=0;
repeat
wait(10)
c:=c+1;
until(GetColor(414,450)=3813571)or(c>390)
c:=0;
repeat
Clickmouse(270,315,true);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
c:=0;
end;
end;

Procedure SelectBait;
Begin
If(GetColor(313, 215)=16777215)Then
Begin
Bait:=Bait+1;
If(BaitType=‘A’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(370,278,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
If(BaitType=‘D’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(450,278,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
If(BaitType=‘F’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(526, 267,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
Wait(3000)
end;
end;

Procedure FirstBait;
Begin
If(GetColor(313, 215)=16777215)Then
Begin
Bait:=Bait+1;
If(BaitType=‘A’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(370,278,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
If(BaitType=‘D’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(450,278,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
If(BaitType=‘F’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(526, 267,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
Wait(3000)
end;
end;

procedure KeepTime;
begin
Seconds:=(GetSystemTime-StartTime) div 1000;
Minutes:=Seconds div 60;
Hours:=Minutes div 60;
if(not(Minutes=0))then
RealSecs:=Seconds mod (Minutes60);
if(not(Hours=0))then
begin
RealSecs:=Seconds mod (Minutes60);
RealMins:=Minutes mod (Hours*60);
end;
if(Minutes=0)then
if(Seconds<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:0’+inttostr(Seconds)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:’+inttostr(Seconds));
if(Hours=0)then
begin
if(not(Minutes=0))then
begin
if(Minutes<10)then
begin
if(RealSecs<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:0’+inttostr(RealSecs)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:’+inttostr(RealSecs));
end else
begin
if(RealSecs<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:0’+inttostr(RealSecs)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:’+inttostr(RealSecs));
end;
end;
end;
if(not(Hours=0))then
begin
if(RealMins<10)then
begin
if(RealSecs<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(RealMins)+’:0’+inttostr(RealSecs)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(RealMins)+’:’+inttostr(RealSecs));
end else
begin
if(RealSecs<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:’+inttostr(RealMins)+’:0’+inttostr(RealSecs)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:’+inttostr(RealMins)+’:’+inttostr(RealSecs));
end;
end;
end;

procedure report;
begin
KeepTime;
If(Not(TotalTime=TotalTime2))then
begin
TotalTime2:=TotalTime;
ClearReport;
Addtoreport(‘We have been working for ‘+TotalTime+’.’);
Addtoreport(‘We have caught ‘+inttostr(Fish)+’ fish,’);
Addtoreport(‘and have used ‘+inttostr(Bait)+’ bait.’);
end;
end;

procedure FindSpeed;
begin
z2:=GetSystemTime;
If(z2-z>500)Then
begin
z:=GetSystemTime;
If(x2>x3)Then
begin
d:=x2-x3;
end;
If(x3>x2)Then
begin
d:=x3-x2;
end;
findcolor(x3,y,0,325,291,436,417);
findcolortolerance(x3,y,526351,325,291,436,417,10);
findcolortolerance(x3,y,16768971,325,291,436,417,10);
findcolortolerance(x3,y,1118495,325,291,436,417,50);
end;
end;

procedure CatchFish;
begin
repeat
{332 for preformance rod. 323 for plus}
if(findcolor(x,y,0,325,291,436,417))or(findcolortolerance(x,y,526351,325,291,436,417,10))or(findcolortolerance(x,y,16768971,325,291,436,417,10))or(findcolortolerance(x,y,1118495,325,291,436,417,50))Then
Begin
x2:=x;
if(x2<xmin)Then
begin
xmin:=x2;
end;
if(x2>xmax)Then
begin
xmax:=x2;
end;
findcolor(c,y,26367,260,203,273,400)
FindSpeed;
if(y<384)Then
begin
status(‘x is at ‘+Inttostr(x2)+’. Lowest = ‘+inttostr(xmin)+’. Highest = ‘+inttostr(xmax)+’. Arrow = ‘+inttostr(y)+’. Left= ‘+inttostr(L)+’. Right= ‘+inttostr®+’. Speed = ‘+Inttostr(d)+’ P/s.’);
end;
If(x<380)Then
begin
movemousesmooth(595,415);
R:=R+1;
end;
If(x>380)Then
begin
movemousesmooth(200,415);
L:=L+1;
end;
wait(20) {^^originals} {^^originals}
End
Else
Begin
If(x2<380)or(x2=380)Then
begin
movemousesmooth(592,415);
end;
If(x2>380)Then
Begin
movemousesmooth(200,415);
end;
//clearreport;
//AddtoReport('Color of Lost Spot = '+inttostr(Getcolor(x,y)));
end;
report;
until(GetColor(254,450)=12370107)or(GetColor(521,277)=2699176)
R:=0;
L:=0;
c:=0;
z:=0;
z2:=0;
xmax:=0;
xmin:=600;
end;

begin
ChangeReportWidth(285)
Status(‘Looking For Client Window’)
repeat
wait(2000)
until(FindWindowBySize(641,581))
FindWindowBySize(641,581);
ActivateClient;
wait(2000)
starttime:=getsystemtime;
xmin:=600;
FirstBait;
//SelectRod; not working
repeat
report;
FindLogan;
SelectBait;
Cast;
P:=P+1;
repeat
wait(100)
status(’~Waiting To Fish~ ~Fish~ ~Waiting To Fish~ '+inttostr§)
report;
findcolor(x,y,26367,260,203,273,400)
until(GetColor(440,198)=2086904)or(y>390)
If(y>200)and(y<390)and(GetColor(440,198)=2086904)Then
begin
status(‘FISHING! FISHING! FISHING! FISHING! FISHING! FISHING! FISHING! FISHING!’)
wait(1000)
CatchFish;
Fish:=Fish+1;
P:=0;
end;
wait(400)
until(false)
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Gaiaonline fisher revamped!
item.dc:creator: @newguy45 newguy45
item.description:
@newguy45 wrote:

[code]////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// -GaiaOnline- //
// -Auto Fisher- //
// -Revamped- //
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
// -Script By JingleBits- //
// -revamped by newguy45- //
// … //
// -Credit to Immafatmess for dealing with my ranting thanks man- //
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
// -whats new- //
// … //
// -Newly added SelectRod procedure- //
// -Minor color adjustments- //
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
// -instructions- //
// … //
// -Drag the crosshair onto the fishing screen- //
// -Set the bait type to eather A,D, or F. //
// -Set the rod choice to eather- //
// -p for proformance- //
// -p+ for Proformance plus- //
// -b for bacic- //
// -b+ for basic plus- //
// -d for distance- //
// -d+ for distance plus- //
// -s for strangth- //
// -s+ for strangth plus- //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program GiaFish;
var Hours,Minutes,RealMins,Seconds,RealSecs,
x,y,c,d,z,z2,x2,x3,xmin,xmax,Fish,Bait,
L,R,P,Q:integer;
StartTime:LongInt;
TotalTime,TotalTime2:string;
const
Click=0;// dont fuck with this
BaitType=‘F’;//A for Grade A. D for Grade D. F for Grade F
RodChoice=‘p+’;//p,b,d,s,p+,b+,d+,s+,b+

procedure SelectRod;
Begin
If(RodChoice=‘b’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(541, 386)=5731482);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘b+’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(541, 386)=5731482);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘d’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(551, 397)=9402461);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘d+’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(551, 397)=9402461);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘s’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(526, 369)=4997255);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘s+’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(526, 369)=4997255);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘p’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(533, 362)=7445074);
end;
If(RodChoice=‘p+’)Then
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,26367,601,445,631,471))then
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500);
until(GetColor(533, 362)=7445074);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
wait(2000);
end;

procedure Cast;
begin
if(Not(GetColor(485, 371)=13033719))Then
begin
c:=0;
If(Getcolor(254,450)=12370107)Then
begin
repeat
Clickmouse(270,315,true);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click-1);
end;
c:=0;
repeat
wait(10)
c:=c+1;
until(GetColor(414,450)=3813571)or(c>390)
c:=0;
repeat
Clickmouse(270,315,true);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
c:=0;
end;
end;

Procedure SelectBait;
Begin
If(GetColor(313, 215)=16777215)Then
Begin
Bait:=Bait+1;
If(BaitType=‘A’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(370,278,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
If(BaitType=‘D’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(450,278,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
If(BaitType=‘F’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(526, 267,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
Wait(3000)
end;
end;

Procedure FirstBait;
Begin
If(GetColor(313, 215)=16777215)Then
Begin
Bait:=Bait+1;
If(BaitType=‘A’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(370,278,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
If(BaitType=‘D’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(450,278,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
If(BaitType=‘F’)Then
begin
repeat
ClickMouse(526, 267,True);
c:=c+1;
until(c>Click);
end;
Wait(3000)
end;
end;

procedure KeepTime;
begin
Seconds:=(GetSystemTime-StartTime) div 1000;
Minutes:=Seconds div 60;
Hours:=Minutes div 60;
if(not(Minutes=0))then
RealSecs:=Seconds mod (Minutes60);
if(not(Hours=0))then
begin
RealSecs:=Seconds mod (Minutes60);
RealMins:=Minutes mod (Hours*60);
end;
if(Minutes=0)then
if(Seconds<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:0’+inttostr(Seconds)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:’+inttostr(Seconds));
if(Hours=0)then
begin
if(not(Minutes=0))then
begin
if(Minutes<10)then
begin
if(RealSecs<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:0’+inttostr(RealSecs)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:’+inttostr(RealSecs));
end else
begin
if(RealSecs<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:0’+inttostr(RealSecs)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:’+inttostr(Minutes)+’:’+inttostr(RealSecs));
end;
end;
end;
if(not(Hours=0))then
begin
if(RealMins<10)then
begin
if(RealSecs<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(RealMins)+’:0’+inttostr(RealSecs)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:0’+inttostr(RealMins)+’:’+inttostr(RealSecs));
end else
begin
if(RealSecs<10)then
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:’+inttostr(RealMins)+’:0’+inttostr(RealSecs)) else
TotalTime:=(inttostr(Hours)+’:’+inttostr(RealMins)+’:’+inttostr(RealSecs));
end;
end;
end;

procedure report;
begin
KeepTime;
If(Not(TotalTime=TotalTime2))then
begin
TotalTime2:=TotalTime;
ClearReport;
Addtoreport(‘We have been working for ‘+TotalTime+’.’);
Addtoreport(‘We have caught ‘+inttostr(Fish)+’ fish,’);
Addtoreport(‘and have used ‘+inttostr(Bait)+’ bait.’);
end;
end;
